content: If you look at the U.S. specifically, what we see there is, is actually a very -- we see the C-band build-out continuing into 2023, as Carl said before, that will, of course, drive CapEx, but the other thing we also see, and that’s important, is we see also a shift in CapEx need into more active components into densification of the network, i.e., in wireless CapEx with lot of the CapEx, probably 3/4 of the CapEx goes into fiber, concrete, steel towers, et cetera.
